Name: Runt Of The Litter
Flavor: You were the weakest of the lot. Were they mistaken?
Ability 1: $Exhaust Change 1 negative modifier token into a positive one

Name: MÃ©salliance
Flavor: Tyrannous customs branded you a bastard
Ability 1: When you break a Combo, place 1 Opening or Break token in the Kratos Pool
Ability 2: %Danger 2+% When you break a Combo, you may lose -1 @Fate
Ability 3: %Danger 6+% $Discard When you break a Combo, perform a Bonus Attack!

Name: Left For Dead
Flavor: They've all written you off, yet your story is still unwritten
Ability 1: $Discard When you survive an Obol, lose up to -3 @Danger and up to -2 @Fate
Ability 2: $Discard When you are about to die from an Instant Death effect, draw an Obol instead
Ability 3: If you are the last Titan alive, you cannot suffer Knockdown and your Titan's Power Die becomes @BlackPowerDie

Name: Spewed By The Abyss
Flavor: Even darkness did not want you
Ability 1: When you are about to gain at least 1 Ambrosia token, test (8+) for each of these tokens. For each success, lower Ambrosia gain by 1
Ability 3: %Danger 7+% $Discard When you are about to draw a Trauma card, gain Ambrosia tokens instead: 1 for Minor, 2 for Major, 3 for Grave, and 4 for an Obol

Name: Coward's Way
Flavor: You owe your cowardice your life. But what kind of life is it?
Ability 1: $Exhaust Before performing a Power Roll, gain @Fate equal to the BP level to immediately fail this Attack instead, ignoring the Fail Responses. If you do, do not place any tokens in the Kratos Pool
Ability 2: %Danger 3+% $Fate $Exhaust When you fail to Wound, place the BP card back on top of the BP deck instead of discarding it
Ability 3: %Danger 5+% $Discard When you are about to become the Target of an Attack, swap places with an adjacent Titan. That Titan becomes the Target instead

Name: Castoff
Flavor: Deemed not worthy, cast from the cliffs, you inexplicably survived
Ability 1: $Exhaust When you are about to reoslve a Trauma Draw, treat your @Danger as 1 lower
Ability 2: When you are knocked down, unexhaust this card. Whn you stand up, gain +1 @Speed, +1 Precision and Auto-break 1 until the end of your turn
Ability 3: When you are about to die from a Trauma Draw, Obol Draw, or an Instant Death effect, you may perform a Bonus Attack! (You still die afterwards.)

Name: Death Precedes
Ability 1: <Start of Battle> You may move 1 space towards the Primordial
Ability 3: <Start of Battle> Place 3 Opening tokens, 2 Break tokens, or 1 Rouse token in the Kratos Pool

Name: Forbidden Love
Flavor: You longed for the fobidden things, desired what was denied to you

Name: Scorned Champion
Flavor: When you reached the top you realized the only way forward was down

Name: Unearned Life
Flavor: They were destined for great things. You should have died, not them
Ability 3: $Discard {Succor}, then, immediately after current Attack ends, draw an Obol

Name: Life Of Regret
Flavor: Every decision you made was the wrong one. Now all you're left with is regret
Ability 2: %Danger 3+% $Exhaust When you are about to suffer Bleeding X or gain Bleeding tokens, ignore that effect
Ability 3: %Danger 5+% $Discard When you are about to Discard a positive Trauma card due to the [Bleeding] Condition card, return it to the top of the deck instead

Name: Time-Crossed Lovers
Flavor: Even time itself will not keep you apart
Ability 1: $Exhaust Reestablish your Time Anchor. You may use this ability as a free action or at the end of your turn
Ability 2: If your Time Anchor is adjacent to that of another Titan's, you have +1 Precision
Ability 3: %Danger 5+% $Discard When you are about to return to a Time Anchor, treat another Titan's Time Anchor as your own

Name: Timekeeper's Child
Flavor: Time and its passage is all you know. One day you will simply stop
Ability 2: %Danger 3+% $Exhaust Another Titan may arrive from Time-clocked
Ability 3: When you arrive from Time-clocked, gain +1 @Speed and {Auto-black 1} until the end of your turn

Name: Disgraceful Parent
Flavor: A lifetime of never being good enough
Ability 1: $Exhaust Place 1 Fire token in the Kratos Pool
Ability 2: %Danger 4+% $Exhaust If the Kratos Pool is empty, place 1 Fire token and 1 Black token in the Kratos Pool
Ability 3: %Danger 6+% $Fate $Exhaust If the Kratos Pool is empty, place 3 Hope tokens in the Kratos Pool

Name: Hero By Mistake
Flavor: This was not your responsibility. You did not ask for this
Ability 2: %Danger 4+% $Fate If you are the Priority Target, gain {Rouse 1}
Ability 3: %Danger 7+% If you are the Priority Target, gain {Hope 1}

Name: The Returned
Flavor: You failed once. Now you need to go back and fix it
Ability 1: <Start of your turn> Reestablish your Time Anchor (even if the Backwards Momentum Trait is not in play). If you are on a Time Anchor, you have +1 Precision
Ability 3: %Danger 7+% $Discard When you die, return from death to your Time Anchor
